author: mharwood
msg: Added BooleanFilter with JUnit test, added BooleanFilter support to XMLQueryParser, Changed TermsFilterBuilder to only build a filter for a single choice of field - multiples can be combined using new BooleanFilter clauses. Added missing MatchAllDocsQueryBuilder source.
